# Princípios

O pacote deve:
1. Ler inputs tanto numéricos quanto em caracteres;
2. Devolver outputs no mesmo formato do input quando for condizente;
3. Inserir o output na coluna imediatamente à direita do input.

# Set Up

```{r}
library(devtools)
library(testthat)
check()
```

# Site do pacote

```{r}
# Run once to configure package to use pkgdown
usethis::use_pkgdown()
# Run to build the website
pkgdown::build_site()

# If you’re using GitHub, we also recommend setting up GitHub actions to automatically build and publish your site:
usethis::use_pkgdown_github_pages()
```
